text: Almas Tower is a skyscraper in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It is 363 meters (1,191 feet) tall and has 68 floors. It was built in 2009 and is one of the tallest buildings in the world. ==Related pages== * List of tallest buildings in the world ==Other websites== * Emporis.com - Almas Tower *SkycraperPage.com â€“ Almas Tower Category:Skyscrapers in the United Arab Emirates Category:Buildings and structures in Dubai Category:2009 establishments in Asia Category:Establishments in the United Arab Emirates
title: Almas Tower
